Articles.Content:
Hey. So before this happened, I was going to undock my little space station in Kerbin Orbit. I've never had this issue and at the time I had RealPlume mods enabled.
I was going to undock my command pod, and as I did it, my KSP crashed. I initially thought it was just a small crash. I restarted my KSP and this is what I came back to: (check video)



I've tried everything, restarting my PC, uninstalling every mod, terminating the station (or command pod that was bugging) and then loading back via save, and it still has the same problem. I sent a rocket up there my self without using the tracking station, and as soon i get near the station, it explodes. Please help, but luckily it was a pretty small station.

This is the part I undocked before it crashed. You can see it is bugged out.


Update: 6hrs and this weird ring has showed up, here's the log as well:

Edited December 5, 2020 by Anthonyplayz18
